name: Match'it
description:
Match the color of Leon the cameleon as much as you can in this frenetic short game ! (Clue : There are more than 3 colours)
  • Play with numpad 1, 2, 3.

Made by me in approximately 11 hours for Trijam#102 : Contrast.

I'm supposed I'm completly out of bound now !?

It was my first time trying Gdevelop, that's why it took me so long...

Music from:

https://freesound.org/people/shinephoenixstormcrow/sounds/337049/
https://freesound.org/people/FunWithSound/sounds/456966/
https://ecrettmusic.com/
